title: ReadyHandshake
description: Handshake payload returned by wallet when it is ready to serve InstantPay requests.

protocolVersion.description: Semantic protocol version supported by the wallet (e.g., '1.0.0').

capabilities.description: Advertised capabilities that the wallet supports (non-normative).

instant.description: Instant payment capability presets supported by the wallet.

asset.description: Asset available for instant payments (TON or Jetton).

limit.description: Per-operation amount limit in the same units as PaymentRequest.amount.
